mapper.sql: a.content_id as id, a.bucket, a.name, a.real_name, a.size, a.type, a.url, a.suffix, a.create_time
mapper.select: SELECT FROM tool_qiniu_content a WHERE name=#{key}

SELECT t1.content_id as id, t1.url, t1.create_time, t1.praise_count, t1.collect_count, t2.username, t2.nick_name, t2.avatar_path
, IF ( t3.user_id = #{userId}, 1, 0 ) AS isPraise, IF ( t4.user_id = #{userId}, 1, 0 ) AS isCollect
FROM tool_qiniu_content t1 LEFT JOIN sys_user t2 ON t1.create_user_id = t2.user_id LEFT JOIN file_user_praise t3 ON t3.file_id = t1.content_id LEFT JOIN file_user_collect t4 ON t4.file_id = t1.content_id ORDER BY
${sort} DESC,
t1.create_time DESC
mapper.update: update tool_qiniu_content set praise_count = praise_count + 1 where content_id = #{fileId}
update tool_qiniu_content set praise_count = praise_count - 1 where content_id = #{fileId}
update tool_qiniu_content set collect_count = collect_count + 1 where content_id = #{fileId}
update tool_qiniu_content set collect_count = collect_count - 1 where content_id = #{fileId}
